title: Tweed and Don; or, Recollections and reflections of an angler for the last fifty years ...
author: Locke, James.
snippet: And so will you find the wheels of the railway from Tynehead to Stow, where you may stop and begin your sport.

title: Tweed and Don; or, Recollections and reflections of an angler for the last fifty years ...
author: Locke, James.
snippet: Supposing you have taken your seat in the carriage, do not, gentle youths, stray in pleasure-paths, and turn aside to minor waters about Tynehead or Heriot, but go on gladly and rejoicingly with an honest and a cheerful heart, the characteristics of a true angler ; for when oiled with these,
